block.p: Laura Simpson Douglas, the daughter of Barbara Gasser of North Attleboro, Mass., and Percy S. Douglas of New York, was married yesterday to Bart Allen Peterson, the son of Margaret and Richard Peterson of Springfield, Mo. The Rev. Winston B. Charles performed the ceremony at St. James' Episcopal Church in New York.

Mrs. Peterson, 29, is the research coordinator in New York for Genesis Entertainment, a television-program syndicatorin Los Angeles. She graduated from Boston University. Her father is a senior partner in the New Producers Organization, a theatrical production firm in New York. Her mother is the office manager for Micro Inc., a computer software manufacturer in Walpole, Mass. The bride is the granddaughter of Katherine S. Douglas of New York and the late Percy L. Douglas, a chairman of the Otis Elevator Company.

Laura Simpson Douglas, the daughter of Barbara Gasser of North Attleboro, Mass., and Percy S. Douglas of New York, was married yesterday to Bart Allen Peterson, the son of Margaret and Richard Peterson of Springfield, Mo. The Rev. Winston B. Charles performed the ceremony at St. James' Episcopal Church in New York.

Mrs. Peterson, 29, is the research coordinator in New York for Genesis Entertainment, a television-program syndicatorin Los Angeles. She graduated from Boston University. Her father is a senior partner in the New Producers Organization, a theatrical production firm in New York. Her mother is the office manager for Micro Inc., a computer software manufacturer in Walpole, Mass. The bride is the granddaughter of Katherine S. Douglas of New York and the late Percy L. Douglas, a chairman of the Otis Elevator Company.

Mr. Peterson, 33, is a salesman in New York for the Marley Cooling Tower Company, a maker of cooling towers for industrial plants. He graduated from Kansas State University and received an M.B.A. from Drury College. His mother is a mail carrier for the Postal Service in Springfield. His father is a regional sales manager there for the Trane Company, a manufacturer of heating and cooling equipment in La Crosse, Wis.
